name: Space Adventure - Where is the gold?
name_original: Space Adventure - Where is the gold?
description:
I made this game as a further developing project from Unity 3D course, and I use it to join the 2021 game jam! It's very short, but I tried my best to apply the skills I learned so far, hope you enjoy it! :)) 

As a spaceship captain, you need to control the spaceship, collect the precious maybe golds, and bring it back to the station safely. It will be easier when you get used to the environments, so try to explore the mysterious space!

Highly recommend to start with the tutorial!

Material Sources: 

Space Image (with plane) City vector created by upklyak - www.freepik.com

Space Station Coffee vector created by vectorpocket - www.freepik.com 

Background Music : Romariogrande from Freesound.org https://freesound.org/people/Romariogrande/sounds/396239/ 

Particle Effects :

JMO Assets -Jean Moreno (JMO) 

Game.dev.TV Complete Unity 3D Course 

Thanks for these amazing creators.
